```{r setup}
library(stochoptim)
```

```{r}
fn <- rastrigin <- function(x) {
  y <- ( 10 * length(x) + sum(x^2 - 10 * cos(2 * pi * x)))
  return(y)
}

D <- 10
lower <- lb <- rep(-5.2, D)
upper <- ub <- rep(5.2, D)
```

```{r}
control <- list(DEoptim = list(popsize = 10*length(lb),
                               maxiter = 200*length(lb),
                               tol  = 1e-10,
                               trace   = FALSE), 
                
                GenSA = list(maxiter = 100))

sopm(fn = fn,lower = lb, upper = ub, control= control)
```
